com.irurueta.server.commons.useragent

Interface UserAgentConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.Configuration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserAgentConfigurationImpl

    public interface UserAgentConfiguration
extends com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.Configuration
    Interface defining parameters to configure user agent detection.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getUserAgentCacheExpirationTimeHours()
      Returns maximum amount of time to keep user agents cached expressed in hours.
      int getUserAgentCacheSize()
      Returns amount of user agents that are cached.
      boolean isUserAgentDetectionEnabled()
      Indicates whether user agent detection is enabled or not.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.Configuration

        fromProperties, toProperties

    • Method Detail

      • isUserAgentDetectionEnabled

        boolean isUserAgentDetectionEnabled()
        Indicates whether user agent detection is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        true if user agent detection is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getUserAgentCacheSize

        int getUserAgentCacheSize()
        Returns amount of user agents that are cached. A cache of user agents is used to speed up the parsing process when user agents get repeated, which can happen if a user makes several requests to the server, or multiple users have the same user agent.
        Returns:
        amount of user agents that are cached.

      • getUserAgentCacheExpirationTimeHours

        int getUserAgentCacheExpirationTimeHours()
        Returns maximum amount of time to keep user agents cached expressed in hours.
        Returns:
        maximum amount of time to keep user agents cached expressed in hours.
